Requirements
------------

* Python 2 & 3
* Django 1.8+

Installation
------------

1. Install it using pip (coming soon):

.. code:: sh

 pip install django-robokassa-merchant


2. Add the ``robokassa_merchant`` app to your ``INSTALLED_APPS``:

.. code:: python

  # settings.py
  INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...,
    'robokassa_merchant',
    ...
  )

3. TODO
